feed.title: Dagu Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.14.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ISSUE #592] formatting of error text in web ui is not very noticeable by @halalala222 in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/670
  • ISSUE[581] Add Built-in Execution Context Variables by @halalala222 in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/654
  • Fixed build issue by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/672
  • [#675] fix: dashboard page fetch http 422 with DAG list API by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/680
  • [#674] Support env var in ssh config by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/683

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.14.3...v1.14.4

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.14.5
entry.content:
Changelog

  • f7cc980239ffa08b53b9f7d9dea89e812a92817c ui: fix: DAG groups are not visible on UI (#686)

What's Changed

  • ui: fix: DAG groups are not visible on UI by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/686

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.14.4...v1.14.5

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.14.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: Add docs for special envs by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/689
  • docs: Add command to run server in docker compose file by @KMe72 in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/693
  • fix: use the server timezone to parse the cron expression by @jonnochoo in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/696
  • docs: add documentation for the time zone configurations by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/698
  • add: new environment config key DAGU_TZ for server & scheduler's time zone setting

New Contributors

  • @KMe72 made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/693
  • @jonnochoo made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/696

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.14.5...v1.14.6

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.14.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: update the Dockerfile & docs by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/699
  • ui: Add Page Limit Input and Improve Case-Insensitive DAG Search by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/702
  • ui: Reimplement Timeline Chart and Adjust Server Timezone Handling by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/704

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.14.6...v1.14.7

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.14.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fixed bug when using the CRON_TZ= cron expression by @jonnochoo in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/707

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.14.7...v1.14.8
